thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 14 of 532
thread.title: Laura Gibbons

author: Laura Gibbons
title: Laura Gibbons
text: The only comment I have is that in the portion of the "quiz" where the customer is asked to provide a sizing preference the size chart should be on the same page or there should be a link to a pop-up for a size chart. I had to kind of look around a bit for the sizing. I was setting up my account using the app and it was not as easy to navigate as on my pc. The rest of the website is great. Very easy to navigate.
